titleStmt.title: A potent vindication for book-making: or An embleme of these distracted times.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Edward.

notesStmt.note: A defense of his "A description of an annuall world" (1641) and his "Sacred poems" (1641) against charges of disrespect to his late master, Sir James Cambell, knight.
Published in 1643 as part 5 of his Time well spent.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
